Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: To generate reliable genetic results that aid in the diagnosis of hereditary hearing loss.
Container: EDTA (purple top) tube, saliva DNA stabilization kit, or approved buccal swab collection kit
Equipment: Thermocycler, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), real-time PCR system, NanoDrop spectrophotometer or Qubit fluorometer, centrifuge, vortex mixer, sterile pipettes
